name: Crimson Silence
description:
You made it. Now you're alone.

You're early. Real Early.

Crimson Silence is currently a pre-alpha prototype. I have the game fully designed, and I'm just building the framework still. I work pretty fast, and I'll be updating the game here pretty often.

My goal is to get it to a demo/vertical slice. After that, I'll expand all the fun things, shape the game based on community feedback, and expending the story and depth in to a real game I'd be proud of. That version will be on Steam, however.

You're trapped on Mars, but you have a mission to do.

In Crimson Silence, you are a researcher sent to a science base built in an unusual impact crater on Mars. Once there, you need to complete missions, analyze rocks, and survive.

Things get interesting once you start to dig up samples that are more than just rocks. As you find impossible items, you can't tell if you are going mad, or reality is.
